generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic arrows, extending into the distance with parked cars on both sides.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, visible as paved areas adjacent to the road, separated by curbs, with pedestrians and parked bicycles.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring architectural details typical of urban residential or commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the sidewalks and street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast or hazy.
- person: A person is visible standing next to an open car trunk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road, and one black car is driving in the middle of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and possibly streetlights.
- traffic sign: Blue and white parking signs (P) are visible on poles along the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, and another bicycle is visible on the left side near parked cars.
